attributes.action: Say no to Knives with Gaynors law.
attributes.additional_details: To ban knives with a minimum sentance of 10 years for carrying a knife and a mandatory life sentance with no parol or reduced sentances for those who kill or commit murder with a knife for true justice for the victims and their remaining families to reduce the horrific numbers of knife crimes to create a better peaceful United Kingdom which will be safer for our young people and future generations to come.
